website_summaries.verdict: With 360-degree adjustability, this mount gives you great phone access, especially for navigation.
pros: Holds smart phones up to 3.7 inches wide
Designed for use with motorcycle and bicycle handlebars 0.9 to1.3-inches in diameter
Rigid mount with metal and plastic components
360-degree rotation for easy adjustment and phone access
Adjustability lets you use for navigation and performance apps
cons: Can be challenging to attach to handlebars on the upper end of the size range

customer_reviews.title: Works great, is sturdy.
customer_reviews.text: These are just what I wanted - a way to have my phone show me gps directions while I ride my bike. The handle bar mount was easy to install and holds the phone. Also, I like that it comes with three different color rubber band phone holders. I realized the rubber band bits hold a phone by itself too, in case you want to lend one to a riding partner.
customer_reviews.author: adi

customer_reviews.title: Mounts easy and securely
customer_reviews.text: During our runs, I use my phone for mileage tracking, music and, if need be, to call for support and the Mongoora Bike Mount works perfectly to attach my phone to our running chair. It is easy to mount and my phone fits securely.
customer_reviews.author: Beth Craig

customer_reviews.title: Great for my 8 (Plus)
customer_reviews.text: Was looking for a minimalist type of holder to replace the bulky bag phone holder I had mounted to my bars. Very simple design and does not take up a lot of space. The 3 color choice (included) is a nice touch, matches the color scheme on my mountain bike. Have not had the chance to field test it, will follow up after I hit the trails. Fits my 8 Plus with protective case. Have two socket holders on the back of phone but no issues. Easy assembly and used the additional longer screw as the Stout bars I have are oval.
customer_reviews.author: Robert L.

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality.  Tightening knob broke.
customer_reviews.text: The entire thing is plastic. It won't tighten enough to securely hold the phone and keep it from flopping around. It held the phone very high up off the handlebars, which looked goofy. The tightening knob broke after very limited use and now the whole thing is trash. Buy something higher quality.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Stapleton

customer_reviews.title: Works for Mountain Biking(surprisingly)
customer_reviews.text: I have to admit when I first got this my initial thought was... there is NO way this will hold my phone mountain biking. I plopped my iphone7 in there, hit the trails and was pleasantly surprised to find it held onto my phone just fine. The bracket does move around a little which means the screen might be facing down after a rock garden but I think that'd be expecting too much.
customer_reviews.author: Vero/Matt

customer_reviews.title: Not secure
customer_reviews.text: Should have returned this right away but gave it a shot. It was never stable and wabbled all around. Today while on a bike ride, it literally snapped off when I went over a bump and my phone flew off. Thankfully I had an otter box on it and a screen protector but the screen protector is now cracked. If your a true bike rider; this is not the right mount for you!
customer_reviews.author: KJGrif

customer_reviews.title: Broke after a few months
customer_reviews.text: When I first got this in November (now May) I thought it was the best phone mount ever. Only a few months later without it being put through extreme conditions, randomly while biking the support just snapped (didn’t hit a bump or anything) and my phone hit the asphalt (picture of the break included). Don’t buy! I was luck my phone wasn’t damaged, dumb luck. It could’ve easily broken it.
customer_reviews.author: Ty

customer_reviews.title: Winner!!
customer_reviews.text: Ordered one for 13 yr old daughter to mount her iPhone to her bike. She had it installed and already using it before I got home from work. She likes it so it's a win for me. Even better is it included a coupon for a free one. So now the wife is loving life! Ok we won't go that far. But the mount works great and can't beat the price. Pleasantly surprised to receive a product that actually does what it's supposed to and for a very reasonable price.
customer_reviews.author: JMC

customer_reviews.title: Solid as a rock!
customer_reviews.text: I just ordered this phone mount for everyday riding around, but it turned out that my first use of it was on a mountain bike ride...and it was great! The ride had my bike bumping all over the place and although the mount moved on my handlebars slightly, that turned out to be because I just hadn't tightened it enough. At no point did the phone remotely look like it would come out, so this did it's job perfectly. I even took a bit of a tumble and the phone stayed where it was supposed to. Fitting it to the handlebars was a simple job, just put it on and tighten it....easy as that. Highly recommend this phone mount!
customer_reviews.author: R. Williamson

customer_reviews.title: Good for its price, fairly stable
customer_reviews.text: simple to use, mechanism is nice and it allows it to be pretty stable, but still shifts a bit on bad roads. Not really built to last. if you keep your bike out in a hot spot or in a car, i would recommend you loosen the nut that tightens it down so it does not snap. Mine broke when I left it in the car, so now I can't use it and it flops everywhere. It was nice while it lasted.
customer_reviews.author: Word Nerd

customer_reviews.title: Neat and useful!
customer_reviews.text: I am obsessed with bike riding and this is what I needed all this time. I used to hide my phone in the pockets of my bike cloth and jackets but now this problem is solved. Now my iPhone is located at its position in front of me pretty sturdy, I do not have to worry about losing it or slipping out of my pockets and ext. I like silicone bands a lot, 3 of them just in case, pretty colors and I can replace or change them if needed. I am glad that now I can do my bike exercises outdoor and enjoy my phone at the same time, pretty neat.
customer_reviews.author: JulieFenAmazon

customer_reviews.title: A useful add-on for my E bike
customer_reviews.text: A solid, sturdy way to attach my iPhone to the handlebar of my Ebike. Three different colors to use with the attachment are a plus. My bike is an MTB on which I do a lot of exploring, so this is a particularly useful way to make mapping/tracking apps easily visible to me. Still, there’s room for improvement. My handlebars are getting cluttered and I had hoped to attach this to the bike’s down tube. However, the an ebike’s downtube is significantly larger than the handle bar and it simply won’t fit. Hopefully, the next iteration of this product can address this.
customer_reviews.author: Mike K

customer_reviews.title: I would recommend a Rockford instead of this because this does not work or hold your phone correctly
customer_reviews.text: I was really expecting more out of this to be honest with you it does not hold upright on a motorcycle handlebars it shakes around a lot you cannot get any good video with this do not buy
customer_reviews.author: Cee l.

customer_reviews.title: Used on Harley Dyna
customer_reviews.text: This can be used on a motorcycle and is secure when riding. Took it on a 3 hour ride where I used my Iphone SE both vertically and horizontally and neither position caused the phone to become unsecure. I do not use a windshield and it was directly in the wind. I do think the arms that the phone sits in could hold tighter but using the band makes it secure. I haven't been involved in a drop yet and do not know whether the phone would stay on the bars if not directly hit. Not willing to try.
customer_reviews.author: William Poulos

customer_reviews.title: A useful gadget for once
customer_reviews.text: Got this as a gift for my husband, he rides a lot. This mounted easy to his bars and holds his Google phone snugly... he can spin it if he is using Google maps... we have recommended it to all that ride with him as a good way not to miss calls, use as a garmin or simply listen to your music while on long rides... Highly recommend as it fits his Harley bars perfectly, I am sure it would fit other bike bars as well...
customer_reviews.author: C.D.O'Connell

customer_reviews.title: Works well on motorcycles and scooters
customer_reviews.text: I've used a couple of these as cheap holders for motorcycles/scooters, and the work very well, and provide a more minimalist option than heavier duty (but more obtrusive) options you would normally find for motorcycles. That it comes with three rubber pieces is what makes this worth the money. They'll only last so long, especially if you're on and off frequently. Having three gives you enough longevity out of this holder that you can replace it four times at $20 and get close to equal longevity as one $80 holder.
customer_reviews.author: Uker laying

customer_reviews.title: Came highly recommended
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my sister and when she got it she was complaining a little bit because it was pretty hard to get the phone in place at first because of her phone case but then she attached it to her bike and took a ride around. When she returned everything had changed. She loved it. She was completely comfortable that there was no way it was going to come off and it was easy to place in a way that she could see it without being distracting. She said so many great things I am getting another one for me.
customer_reviews.author: David Armstrong

customer_reviews.title: If this holds up, it's a good choice for smart phones on your bike
customer_reviews.text: I have a computer on my full size bike but I wanted something for my folding Brompton that would not interfere with the fold of the handlebars. This does not (mounted on the left side). It seems to be built OK and once set in place with my phone doesn't move about. The question is: with the silicon rubberbands last. I've had good luck in the past with silicon but as the main securing point on this holder, it's a leap of faith. But on a quick 1 mile, rough road ride to test it out, it worked fine.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Great mount, except for one little thing...
customer_reviews.text: Ok, not so little. Pros: The clamp works very well. The silicone rubber band thing is great. Cons: This is big, the ball joint thing is, like every other one I have ever used, complete crap. I hit the smallest bump and the thing moves. I have even tried cranking it down with a wrench and it still moves! Like the other ones I have used, I will find the right spot and then use epoxy to glue it into that position. People, STOP using these ball joints on your products. They are terrible. Use interlocking teeth. Sure you don't get an infinite range of motion, but do you need that?
customer_reviews.author: Michael Williams

customer_reviews.title: Very stable secure phone mount definitely worth buying.
customer_reviews.text: This easily fit on my bike and is very secure, it comes with 3 stretchy plastic phone holders and also has a side compression clasp to hold the phone. Initially I used 2 of the plastic holders but that was overkill so I took one off. My phone does not move or even wobble. The mount can be adjusted easily for any position. I loved this so much I bought another one for my other bike. Definitely recommend this phone mont... I have an iPhone 8 and my husbands 10 R also fits with no problems.
customer_reviews.author: Tina F.

customer_reviews.title: Probably wont last very long
customer_reviews.text: Holds phone well, but the spring is so tight it's hard to get into the jaws. I dont think it will last long, the palstic jaws are bending due to the forces. My phone has a protector so it's a little thicker (16mm) whoch is just barely on the edge of working with this. The rubber band covers with camera which tricks the phone into thinking it's in my pocket. So when I touch the screen to do something, it wont respond. Which is difficult on a bike.
customer_reviews.author: bill

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install and worked great!
customer_reviews.text: The most important aspect of this product for me was the stability - I didn't want my phone falling off during a ride! So far, the product has been very stable. The phone has kept its orientation and doesn't slide around at all. I haven't taken my bike on serious trail rides with the phone mount; but I've taken it several miles on dirt paths and some rough pavement. It was easy to install - less than five minutes. I have a Trek bike and it fit the handlebar fine.
customer_reviews.author: Brad

customer_reviews.title: 5 Stars
customer_reviews.text: Simple, innovative and highly effective. When I received the small box, I thought they sent the wrong thing. The phone holder I'm currently using has big hunks of plastic pieces to secure a simple cell phone. It's quite a contraption and it's ugly. This is a great phone holder. It's mount is simple and holds the phone securely. It comes with 3 different color "rubber bands". Quick and easy to mount and dismount. I highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Jay Fishman

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: Works well so far but I’ve only used it maybe 5 times. The other phone holders I’ve used tend to quickly have issues with the ball/socket holder loosening up and no longer holding the phone in the desired position. It already does move a touch and I have to adjust it here and there. I also have a large phone with a thick case (iPhone 8 plus) so I’m sure it’s heavy and doesn’t help with that (maybe they can make a slightly larger one with a bigger weight capacity or something to better suit the bigger phones?).
customer_reviews.author: Dr. Ian Malcolm

customer_reviews.title: Love this to hold my Essential phone.
customer_reviews.text: Fits on my folding bike handle bars very well. I like the soft rubber that grips the sides of my phone gently since I'm babying my new phone right now. The rubber netting hold the 4 corners of my phone steady but not too much. Just enough tension. And the pivoting mount keeps the face of the phone at just the right angle I like. This is the first phone mount I have ever purchased and I'm very happy with this product. I like the different color nettings you can use. I'm using the green at the moment because it's my favorite color but will use the red before winter comes......
customer_reviews.author: underdog2904

customer_reviews.title: Broke Before Even Used
customer_reviews.text: Junk. Look elsewhere. I mounted it on my handlebars and spread the side clamps with my thumbs to test them and see how wide they opened and something snapped inside and the left clamp is no longer spring loaded. Almost useless. Nice idea, nice design, terrible execution.
customer_reviews.author: richard

customer_reviews.title: Stay away: broke after not even 1 month of use.
customer_reviews.text: Bad, bad, bad choice. I always commute by bike and I have used this bike mount for about 10 times. Then it suddenly broke into 2 pieces (see attached image) and my phone fell on the street, breaking its glass. Do yourself a favor and stay away. *** EDIT *** After speaking with the Customer Service, they have reimbursed me and they are sending me a similar item which could be more fit for my needs. Definitely a 5 stars service.
customer_reviews.author: Marco

customer_reviews.title: very sturdy
customer_reviews.text: i have had this on my harley for a while now. i have used it on a lot of short trips and a few longer trips. It has stayed in place and holds my iPhone 6 plus with a case. my phone never moves or sags at all like i was expecting. great phone holder
customer_reviews.author: jared

customer_reviews.title: Great product, very secure
customer_reviews.text: I use this on my sawmill so I can read books while pushing the saw through a cut. As you might imagine the vibration is quite strong but this holder doesnt move at all unless adjusted. Very sturdy and holds the phone securely so it wont fall out, though the webbing can be annoying when it covers part of the phone or the "buttons" pressing on it does work most of the time. I imagine this would work splendidly on a bike
customer_reviews.author: Rozenkruetz

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Had bought a different phone holder and had to return because screw would not hold unit on bike handle, there was no nut to tighten. Got this phone mount unit and it is nice and tight and the bands hold the phone quite well. The only reason i gave four stars, i bought another for my grandson and it is a bit difficult For him to get the phone in the little arms, tough to open. Otherwise it is fine
customer_reviews.author: FranieB

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Quick and easy to install in just a minute or two. Designed to fit multiple handler bar diameters securely with 3 different positions and two different screws to secure it. Really like that it takes NO tools to install! I'll be able to use it on a mountain bike or a road bike with no additional hardware. Stable when riding and adjustable angle for best viewing when necessary. The way it's mounted allows for easy tapping on any part of the screen. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Spo

customer_reviews.title: Works well with any phone
customer_reviews.text: Used it several times for 20 mile long mountain bike rides, mixed terrain. Tested it with one of the biggest phones on the market, the Samsung Galaxy S20 Ultra and a more regular sized phone, Galaxy S10. It holds securely in place in both portrait or landscape orientation. I didn't even have to use the safety rubber bands, but it's great that it comes with a few different colors. Great product so far.
customer_reviews.author: pardos

customer_reviews.title: Empty Promises & Broke super easy
customer_reviews.text: I opened my box and found a coupon for another item, but the email confirmation never came through, I tried several times and checked spam... nothing, but I got over that. I initially thought it was great - though the spring is super tight and made loading the phone difficult to get in, it seemed really secure - but it wasn't, the phone never came out but the unit kept spinning. When I tried to hand tighten it the ball that secures it cracked so now the device is useless. I can not find any way to contact the seller to utilize the lifetime warranty.... so I guess it started with a broken promise and ended with one as well.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for average, casual use
customer_reviews.text: I ordered one for my daily, casual bike rides on level paths. It is perfect for that. Then I ordered a second for my husband. He liked it for our rides together, but won’t use it for his intense, 30-40 mile rides. Pros: fits phones easily, easy to install, seems able to handle casual bike rides well Cons: because the part that connects to the bike is plastic, it can easily be over tightened, causing it to loose stability
customer_reviews.author: Lit Lover

customer_reviews.title: Secures phone and easy to install
customer_reviews.text: I really like this buke mount. It was easy to install. The clasp part has different grooves so you can adjust for different circumference of bike handles. It also has a small and large screw. Once installes your phone is secure and doesn't move. The claw grip and the silicone keep your phone firmly in place. You can still rotate and adjust your phone due to the ball design. Ive uses it with my phine case on and off and have had no problem with it securing my phone.
customer_reviews.author: Daniell

customer_reviews.title: Holds the phone right where I need it
customer_reviews.text: When I ride at night I have to flip my phone forward so the screen brightness doesn't blind me, and this makes it easy to do. I've used this with a Note 8, Note 10+, and Iphone 10xs max, all fit. Rubber holds phone in place and I can still use the phone to get directions, navigation, or just ride tracking. Been using it a couple months riding 3-4 times a week with no issues.
customer_reviews.author: J. Peshek

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Cell Phone Mount
customer_reviews.text: Installed easily enough - 3 choices of band colors (I went with black in the picture) - and securely held phone to bike handle bars. It comes with a larger mounting screw and adjustable bracket so you can mount it to a wide range of bars - or even the main frame if you wanted to. Held phone securely while riding and its super easy to get the phone out of the mount - no unscrewing things - just flip the band off and pull the phone out of the mount.
customer_reviews.author: A. Evans

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, serves it's purpose, held up easily on 311 mile trip
customer_reviews.text: I biked 311 miles over the course of five and a half days to propose to my girlfriend (now fiancee). I needed something to hold my phone with the gps and not worry about it falling. The colored rubber band like things were sturdy and kept it in place. I used one color the whole way from NY to VA and they give you two other rubber bands with it. The mount worked great even with my bike having rather large handles. One thing to note is if it rains you will need something to cover the phone. This mount served it's purpose perfectly and I would definitely recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Candela

customer_reviews.title: Solid Product, Good Value
customer_reviews.text: I'm impressed with this product, especially considering the price. I bought it initially for my bike that's set up indoors, although I plan to transfer it to my road bike. I'm not sure I would trust it to hold my phone securely without one of the provided rubber bands, although other reviewers said they've had good success. Given the spring action, it seems that the wider your phone, the more secure it will be. One bit of advice: Be sure to measure your handlebars and compare with the specifications: mine was almost too big.
customer_reviews.author: Mark A. Ray

customer_reviews.title: Love this type of mount!
customer_reviews.text: I love this type of mount that allows me to adjust my music for my earbuds or bose speaker strapped to my bicycle. It sits above the handlebars and out of the way of the brakes, gear shifters, etc. This is the second one I have purchased. One for my bike in Arizona and one for my bike in Pittsburgh! Great mount. Fast to mount. Fits every thickness of handlebar or stem as it has two lengths of mounting screws. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Chuck

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: I was excited to get this phone mount because having my larger phone in my pocket whilst biking is rather a bother. It arrived quickly, super easy to install, and I love that there are different colour options. My iPhone 6s fits nicely in it, and it doesn't seem like it will fall out. I've only gone biking on the road with it, and haven gone off-roading yet. Will update on that if I go off-roading. I'm definitely buying one for my husband and would highly recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: petitemousie

customer_reviews.title: Very Secure
customer_reviews.text: This is my second mount. I had to get a new one since I changed phone. The first one only had a grip not the web to secure it further. This one is very secure and for ma that is the number one factor. The top right retainer gets in the way of the save function in Strava but it's not a deal breaker. Plus you get two extra webbings. Since I commute by back, it will get used everyday and it's nice to know I have spares.
customer_reviews.author: Pascal Foucault

customer_reviews.title: So happy with my purchase
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had this on my electric bike for over a year and I use it all the time. Honestly love it. If it ever breaks I have 2 other rubber grabbing thingies so that’s good because it’ll last a long time. The only thing that isn’t “great” about it is that if you have a pop socket in the back of your phone it won’t be able to grab your phone right and it might come out while riding. I just take mine off so it’s not a huge issue but it would be nice if they made the plastic grabbing side where the phone goes over wider. Other than that... I love it!
customer_reviews.author: Lucia Villa

customer_reviews.title: The best accessory on my bike.
customer_reviews.text: I’m so happy that I was Able to find this item because I’d like to track my Length of ride and this allows me to have my phone with me I can get to maps I can see the distance anyway listen to the podcast without having to worry about my phone length of ride and this allows me to have my phone right for me I can get to maps I can see a distance anyone listen to the podcast without having to worry about my phone getting damaged.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Throw it in the trash
customer_reviews.text: Bought two. First one for my 12 year old. He can not separate the sides to put phone into holder because the resistance is to hard. Second one for my younger son broke on the very first time I showed him how to separate the sides. Loud slapping sound and then one of the sides had no resistance. Returning both. But it is a waste of my time cause they needed a cell phone holder for their bikes.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The BEST bike phone holder!
customer_reviews.text: This is unquestionably the best most secure and versatile cell phone holder available for any bicycle enthusiast. This device very securely holds your device in two ways with the sliding side bracket and the addition of the silicone stretch it will hold your device in place over the roughest of terrain for off road or off the path travel. Simple to install with no tools necessary highly recommend for anyone looking for a secure method of holding your device and still have full view and access to the screen.
customer_reviews.author: Keith Phillips

customer_reviews.title: Not the greatest looking but very secure
customer_reviews.text: Not the sexiest, sleekest, or lightest but it does the job. This holds the phone a lot more securly than I thought it would. I cannot imagine the phone ever falling off. The red and black bands are the same size and the green is the largest. I have a Galaxy S8 and I use the green one. My spouse just got an iPhone 7 plus so we will see if this works for a phone that large (and in a case). The phone sits pretty far off the handle bar which I'm not crazy about but this will work.
customer_reviews.author: Steph M

customer_reviews.title: Works for Iphone 11 with a full Case
customer_reviews.text: Was worried when i ordered if it would actually hold my phone, in the case. It was a tight fit but my first ride with the mount was 8 miles and of hills and bumps. the phone stayed secure and in place. The rubber colored parts were tight to stretch over the phone and covered some of the buttons that i needed to use during the ride but its doable. other than the case being hard to get the phone in and covering some of the screen it did the job and held the phone in place.
customer_reviews.author: David and Katie Renfro

customer_reviews.title: Simple and works great!
customer_reviews.text: I really enjoyed using this for the first ride today. I have an I phone in a case and it held it very secure made my phone easily accessible . I also love the fact it comes with 3 bands so you can change out. I would recommend this to any bike riders. I do not mountain bike so cannot comment on how it would work on really tough trails. But for road bikes absolutely perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Robyn

customer_reviews.title: Great for a bicycle commute
customer_reviews.text: I commute to work on my bike and go past some decent bumps and get to some pretty high speeds going down hill. So far this thing has help up great - it’s easy enough to adjust the position, but it manages to hold the position really well when riding. The straps hold the phone on very securely, though it does take two hands to put the phone in and take it out.
customer_reviews.author: cb

customer_reviews.title: Good mobile device holder.
customer_reviews.text: This is a great option for bicyclists who want to bring their phablets along for the ride. It holds onto any phone securely, and positioned correctly, can allow you to take selfies with your riding buddies without stopping or removing your phone from its perch. The only complaint I have is with the handle bar mount. It is fussy and difficult to get right, especially when trying to maneuver around the brake and shifter cables. The process just takes a little swearing and results in sore fingers, but once on, its strong. It also comes with three different silicon nets so you can choose your color on a whim.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Durfee

customer_reviews.title: It just works
customer_reviews.text: Never had one before, so can't compare, and I only cycle casually (less than 80 miles a week in town), so I ain't doing mountains. With all that said, I have a $700 phone and this mount seems to work just fine. The one minor drawback is one corner always seems to be right on the logon button, so I just leave that corner off. Never had any issues. Good mount at a reasonable price.
customer_reviews.author: Donn Urban

customer_reviews.title: Happily surprised
customer_reviews.text: After purchasing this I wasn’t sure how it would hold up. I have a 7a phone in a plastic case and it appears to barely be secure in there. However, I’ve ridding the bike 7-8 miles through neighbor hoods with some bumps and it’s be fine. I accident knocked my bike over with my phone in the holder and it didn’t pop out! U sure how it will hold up off roads but so far so good. Happily surprised and recommend this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: ANJ

customer_reviews.title: Great Phone Holder
customer_reviews.text: I myself have a Samsung S10 and it fits and grips perfectly without any issues even with the case on. Not sure if each box comes with a voucher for another free one but I sure did and cashed in for my wife's bike. She has an iPhone 11 and it fits pretty well, not as snug as mine but still no issues with the phone falling out. Overall I definitely recommend this phone holder for any bike you may have.
customer_reviews.author: Arnold villatoro

customer_reviews.title: Easy to set up and secure
customer_reviews.text: I just got a bike for the first time since I was a teenager and one of the things I wanted to get for my new bike was a sturdy phone mount. You see so many listed out there for $20+ with not so great reviews but this one gets the job done for the right price. I have a Galaxy S9 with a pretty bulky case on it and it holds my phone really well. I love that it comes with extra silicone bands for the phone which I didn't see with other holders. I've taken it out on a few bike rides and my phone stays in place over hills and bumps. Such a fantastic product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This mount works great and secures my phone wonderfully.
customer_reviews.text: While my phone doesn't fit seamlessly onto the mount due to the phone case having a kickstand on the back, I am still able to mount it by flipping the rubber grip and leaving more space on the bottom of the mount than the top, though this runs the risk of engaging my volume and lock buttons. Still, the mount works great and secures my phone well.
customer_reviews.author: MrAloha

customer_reviews.title: Game changer for the price
customer_reviews.text: Game changer for me, I bike about a 10 hours per week and this has changed the game for me as can see maps and pace apps , it is a lil hard to get an iPhone 7plus in an otter box case into it but it has worked fine for a month now , got a 2nd one and it holds an external battery so that can charge phone while riding ... would highly recommend especially for the price
customer_reviews.author: Gary Resmondo Jr

customer_reviews.title: This phone holder works!
customer_reviews.text: This is my second phone holder; the first was such a nuisance it was thrown away. This phone holder works because it stays in position on my handlebars even when I go over bumps; it is easy to attach and remove my iPhone 8 from the holder; and the elastic colors are cool. Am getting a second one for my daughter's bike. Definitely worth the money paid and more.
customer_reviews.author: Shelter Bay Lily

customer_reviews.title: Great handlebar adjustable phone holder
customer_reviews.text: This phone holder is exactly what I was looking for. It was easy to mount to the handlebars of my Trikke and holds my iPhone 6s in its case very securely. My phone stays where I put it yet I can still make adjustments if needed without having to loosen the connection. The bands that come with it work well too. I put my phone so it’s off center a bit to clear the volume and power buttons on the sides. The bands are made in a way to accommodate that. The mount seems to be well made. I see no reason it shouldn’t last me a good long time. I am very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Patti Cannan

customer_reviews.title: Fits iphoneX perfectly. And very snug.
customer_reviews.text: Fits my IPhone X plus, perfectly! If you have trouble making this fit your bike, I discovers that if you separate it at the main joint, there are two or three little “lips” you can slide and shuts the joint to fit larger sizes. It didn’t mention that in the obviously Chinese to English translated instructions. Great product! Just what I wanted.
customer_reviews.author: TexaSean

customer_reviews.title: Inexpensive but does the job
customer_reviews.text: Overall this was a great purchase. I wish the components were some sort of metal but at least with plastic I don’t have to worry about it resting. The color allows for a snug fit win screwed in tightly, but easily loosens when necessary. Love that it comes with three different color options for the silicone. I chose the light green.
customer_reviews.author: Eric Stephenson

customer_reviews.title: Keep your Phone Secure
customer_reviews.text: I needed a mount to handle 1-1/4 aerobars including a handle bar tape and this fits perfectly. A nice touch in the kit are 2 mounting screws for various size tubes. The bands to hold the phone in place are actually 3 different sizes. The don't vary too much, but noticeable. The phone stays secure even when riding over those washboard type warning groves on the side of a road.
customer_reviews.author: James Shannon

customer_reviews.title: Easy installation and sturdy on the trail
customer_reviews.text: This worked perfectly for my iPhone XS. Installation took minutes. The bike phone mount comes with clear, well-written instructions with pictures that make it super easy to install correctly. Even on very bumpy mountain bike trails, this bike phone mount kept my phone in place and steady. The best is that it works for every phone so I don't need to buy a new mount every time I change phones.
customer_reviews.author: Happy Customer

customer_reviews.title: Universal Mount for phone
customer_reviews.text: This mount is a well made mount for phones on a bike. I have had dedicated mounts for particular phones in the past having to upgrade with each phone change. This mount solves that issue. While it may not be as stable as the dedicated mount, it does an excellent job of providing a universal phone holder. No more new orders when the next phone comes out.
customer_reviews.author: Ronald Hakola

customer_reviews.title: Read before purchasing!
customer_reviews.text: I spent a week or so searching through amazon to find a mount that would work for my bike. After reading through all the reviews I found this one. It fits properly on my handle bar and the extra rubber band support really hold it tight. The best part is they put a redeemable code 1/50 inside the box that allowed me to receive another one for my father. We both took some tumbles on our bikes the the mount hasn’t broken yet! Keep in mind I am on a road/ mountain bike and don’t do any EXPERT trails but so far so good :) would highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: GREAT Bike Cell Phone Holder
customer_reviews.text: Used my cell phone holder today. Great product! Stayed in place. No vibrations over rough paved surface. Got a call, touched the screen, chatted while cycling. Caller did not complain of extra noise, heard me just fine, they didn’t realize I was cycling. Bonus: Had the voucher in my packaging for a free holder. Followed the instructions and a complimentary holder arrived within a few days. Recommending to all my cycling friends. Thank you Mongoora!
customer_reviews.author: Spyder Woman

customer_reviews.title: Secure mounting. Quality build. Versatile.
customer_reviews.text: Holds phone very securely. Seems like quality made. Like the rubber/vinyl mount bushings. Holds the product securely in place without twisting around. The swivel head lets you put this in a wide variety of locations and angles. Does not flop around at all. Phone is gripped by rubber/silicon so no scratching and reduced vibration. Arrived quickly. Very satisfied with the quality and value. Have them on all 4 of my bikes and very pleased versatility and durability.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit for my Moto G7
customer_reviews.text: Nice and simple phone mount for my Electra (old guy) Cruiser. Holds the phone well. Update -With the mount I did receive a voucher (such a voucher in every 50th box) good for 1 more product free. I ordered one more of these mounts for my wife but have not received a response or product. No harm because it is supposed to be free but still........
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Held phone in a fall
customer_reviews.text: I have used this product for a month now and it is a great product. It is a little tough to get the phone into the brace but putting the band on each corner is very easy. Very easy to install and comes with 3 straps which are different colors to choose from. Stays very tight on my handlebars after many rides over the past month. Took a fall and it held my iPhone 11 in place with no damage. Reasonable price and mine came with a card allowing me another one for free. Great deal with a great product. The company sent me another one free of charge and free shipping.
customer_reviews.author: Sally S

customer_reviews.title: Easy install secure awesome bike mount for phone
customer_reviews.text: Very impressed with this bike mount. Super easy to install comes with two screws a shorter one and a longer one to ensure a perfect fit on different bar diameters sharp sleek look also had a none slip rubber fitting to hold in place during bumby rides. I'm using for a Google pixel XL and a ZTE blade spark phone. Both have cases and one has a popsocket this doesn't seem to interfere with the securing of the phone's to mount
customer_reviews.author: Bethany M.

customer_reviews.title: not worth the money
customer_reviews.text: This is the 2nd one in a month that broke. The seller gets 5 stars for a quick replacement. But the spring that holds tension on one of the sides broke again, that is times 2. If you neglect to use the rubber strap that holds the 4 corners of your phone, your phone will hit the ground when you get jarred by a bump. Ask me how I know. I use this every day for a 20 mile ride
customer_reviews.author: rick lawrence

customer_reviews.title: Great phone holder!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great phone holder. It fits my iPhone 6s with a Defender Otterbox on it. The additional elastic rubber holder adds extra security. I have a slanted handler bar so I mounted it in the slope. The only con is that it is hard to remove the phone. It would be nice to have a release for the spring. However, that is why makes it hold the phone so we’ll.
customer_reviews.author: Hil

customer_reviews.title: Exceeded expectations
customer_reviews.text: I am honestly really impressed with this little mount! I wanted it on my bike stem and ended up taking off the rubber layer for the attachment area, but it still doesn't budge once screwed on. I had my phone mounted on this mostly for music on a 60mile ride on gravel/trail, and my phone moved around WAY less than expected! With all the bumping and maneuvering, I expected it to dip down instead of staying up the whole time. I didn't have to adjust it more than once or twice the whole ride. When I was back on the smoother road, even with potholes and such, it still stayed in place. Great product for the price!
customer_reviews.author: Jeanie Arnold

customer_reviews.title: Excellent design
customer_reviews.text: I usually keep my phone in the pocket of my shorts while I ride, but recently I've started wearing bike shorts which have no pockets. I looked at a lot of phone mounts, so many of which seemed error prone especially over rough terrain. I love that this one has a clamp AND a net to hold the phone. I also appreciate the longer pin provided to secure the mount, as my bike has goofy handlebars that aren't actually round. The longer pin was necessary to span the distance. Super pleased with the performance so far, my phone has been completely stable on multiple rides. I will be buying another for my husband.
customer_reviews.author: Elyse B.

customer_reviews.title: actually works!
customer_reviews.text: ”just put this on my bike. It holds my phone in its case (iphone 7) wonderfully without falling. it comes with 3 bands I guess in case one gets worn out or to match your bike. the holder also tilts and rotates for the best position for you. I put it on my handbars as the bike frame was to big for it to fit correctly.”
customer_reviews.author: Mary Miller

customer_reviews.title: It would be great but it broke :(
customer_reviews.text: I ordered 2 and one already broke. The clip that holds the phone lost the spring. So now its useless. Can't return anymore either. Bummer. Otherwise the other one so far so good.
customer_reviews.author: C. Weschler

customer_reviews.title: Best mount thus far!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product so that my son could take his cellphone with him on his longer bike journeys but still use the GPS feature. To be honest for the cost, I wasn’t expecting much. I anticipated cheap stuff that would break soon. Well, I certainly was very wrong. The product producer clearly cares about their name this exceeded my expectations and I am so pleased. It fit the phone perfectly ( iPhone X ) it even has a feature where you can adjust the mount so it’s in better view. It’s all around a fabulous product! I’ve bought several mounts for his cellphone and they didn’t last more than a week. For this one I am very hopeful!
customer_reviews.author: Daryen

customer_reviews.title: Just What I Needed
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a secure cell phone holder for my mountain bike. I was nervous at first trying to find the right one, after reading the reviews, which I usually read 1 star and 2 stars first to putting more weight on what reviewers didn't like more then what they do. I took a chance on these Mongoora cell holders and have been very pleased with what I got and their functionality with easy installing process. I can't compare it with any others but so far I am happy at my decision.
customer_reviews.author: Siha Top

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t last long, iPhone XR...
customer_reviews.text: Had it on my wheelchair to hold my iPhone XR & the spring that holds both parts together to keep it secure already broke, the pieces that hold the phone on are really skinny also so it’s hard to hold a heavier phone...
customer_reviews.author: Jacob

customer_reviews.title: This is a pretty good quality product
customer_reviews.text: It's solid and I appreciate that they included a couple extra of the silicone 'bands' to hold the phone on. Across 2 rides and about 40+ miles I feel like it hasn't wiggled at all. Looking to see if the ball/nut combo can be made a little tighter since it drifts down a tiny bit over the ride, but that's the only thing I see so far that isn't spot-on.
customer_reviews.author: Ron Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Just a wonderful phone mount that is quick and easy to use.
customer_reviews.text: Recieved this item earlier today and it has been great, assembly was very easy. The design holds the phone quite well, just overall this is a great product. I do have concerns that the rubber strapping might degrade over time but as it stand it is quite wonderful. My only complaint is that the straps cover the far corners of the phone making the time hard to read.
customer_reviews.author: Dennis S. Yu

customer_reviews.title: Used for motorcycle
customer_reviews.text: Overall, I'm happy with the product. I can attach it to my motorcycle handlebars which is 1.3" diameter; the max size listed. I don't have any issues with the phone moving around when I'm riding so I am pleased with this purchase. I gave 4 stars because I think transparency is important. The clamp does not actually fit over the handlebars correctly. The reason this product is listed as able to fit a 1.3" diameter is because it comes with an additional screw clamp that is longer. The curve of the part that goes around the handlebars don't fix exactly. Since it still holds my Pixel 2 XL phone I didn't feel the need to return. I would purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Adrien Fox

customer_reviews.title: What a great investment!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to keep my phone handy for longer bike rides with my kids and to keep it secure so it didn’t fall out of my pocket again. It is very easy to use and a sturdy design. The combination of the flexible rubber grip and the strong hold from the clamp removed any worry about it falling out.
customer_reviews.author: Mel in Texas

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: I am using the phone mount on my new E Bike. I love the bike and ride almost everyday. Wanted a mount that was safe to use for a galaxy GS9 phone. Bought this one and not disappointed. Holds phone very securely. I do not worry that phone will fall off when I ride over hills and bumps. When I met with bike dealer she say my mount and said "that's the one we sell in the shop!" Made me feel like a made a good choice and I am sure I got the best price online.
customer_reviews.author: Diana N.

customer_reviews.title: Larger phones barely fit. A piece snapped snapped after my first fall rendering it useless.
customer_reviews.text: The elastic straps are great, especially the colors, except they are extremely tight on larger phones (Pixel 3XL user). Because of this, I rarely used it. I commute by bike, so eventually wiping out was inevitable. The first time I did, one of the arms that hold the phone in place snapped, and it is now trash. If I decide to get another, I'll try a different brand.
customer_reviews.author: Abe :)

customer_reviews.title: Easy to attach to bike
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this for my Gary Fisher hybrid bike. Opened up and had it installed in a few minutes. Easy to attach to my handlebars, instructions were good but you could do it without them. Attachment is firm and bands hold my iPhone XS very firmly to the unit. Love the extra bands. Looks great and does the job. Excellent value!
customer_reviews.author: Steven J.

customer_reviews.title: Holds my phone securely
customer_reviews.text: Bought this phone holder for my Samsung S7 and my Trek road bike. Easy to install. Sits a little higher than I'd like, but that is so you can maneuver it. Held my phone very snug on the July 206 mile Seattle to Portland ride (2 days). I'd recommend this phone holder and they give you a few colors of straps. Oct 2020 update: Is there a way to get a replacement plastic ring? I have had mine since last July and the ring that tightens the threads on the phone holder cracked. Thank you
customer_reviews.author: J. White

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install and use!
customer_reviews.text: When riding unfamiliar trails with our mountain bikes, I found myself looking at my phone more than I thought I ever would. Especially when going over rocks and roots, using one hand, it was tough! This installed quickly and easily and I can see the phone screen well. Very little shake and I am even able to make it fit with my Pop-Socket attached!
customer_reviews.author: Bobby Harris

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good
customer_reviews.text: I have a Galaxy 9+ with a thick protector. Getting the tiny clips to fit the phone is a bit tedious and annoying as they're made more for phone with no or small protectors. The rubber is very good though. I wish they made this a bit wider. Bottom line, it did the job, just make sure you use both the clips and the rubber.
customer_reviews.author: Alucard

customer_reviews.title: Great for mountain biking and for motorcycles
customer_reviews.text: I initially purchased these for my street motorcycles as it's hard to find a phone mount that accommodates my large phone. I was pleasantly surprised at the ease of installation as well as the overall design of the mount. I've driven through some bumpy streets and my phone hasn't wobbled. The only downside is that the rotating mount can wiggle through some bumps , but the phone and mount are secure. Purchased a few more for some mountain bikes and found that they worked even under the most extreme conditions!
customer_reviews.author: RVS

customer_reviews.title: Struggles to accomodate LARGE phones & cases.
customer_reviews.text: The springs are really quite strong, but the large size of my cell phone in its protective case are not perfectly compatible with the mount. It's hard to get the phone into the grips due to the strength of the springs. The silicone restraints do most of the work to keep the phone in place. The black one I started with work nicely.
customer_reviews.author: Gary Greene

customer_reviews.title: easy to mount on bars, and very secure!!
customer_reviews.text: Great phone mount!!, bought this mount for my iphone XR. I switch it between my bicycle and my motorcycle. The roads around my home are really rough, and it holds my phone securely! Plus it has a thumb screw that makes it easy to switch between my rides! I am very pleased with this mount, and highly recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: chaindrivecharlie

customer_reviews.title: Poor Build Quality
customer_reviews.text: Rubber grips are not glued or attached to the actual holder, so they do not stay in place to protect handle bar. However, once tighten, they are pretty solid in place. It does not clamp around all areas of my handle bar, so positioning is limited. Barely fits my iPhone 7+.. any larger and the holder would probably break. Don’t be fooled by the 4 star product reviews. This holder is not worth the buy.
customer_reviews.author: LYNN

customer_reviews.title: Just be careful when removing your phone
customer_reviews.text: Arrived today and installed in about a min (two due to readjusting). Great stability, silicone strap could be a smidge stronger but strong nonetheless. My only advise is to hold on to your phone when removing the strap. I took off one corner and all corners came u done and phone flipped out of grip. Luckily I caught it but if I wasn’t paying attention I’d be telling a different tale. Overall great product 👍🏼
customer_reviews.author: Bukkakefan

customer_reviews.title: The rubber band broke straight out of the box
customer_reviews.text: Well, I never really used the product because the rubber band broke while trying to affix it to my phone. Lucky for me, I intentionally did the first mount attempt over a pillow on a table. I didn't want to trust the safety of a $1,200 phone to a $16 product so I tossed the mount into the trash - had it for about 15 minutes before it hit the trash can.
customer_reviews.author: Dilbert Speaks

customer_reviews.title: Very secure bike mount for iPhone XR
customer_reviews.text: Love this phone bike mount. Have taken it on roads, off roads( boardwalks , gravel, brick ways) and trails and it is very secure and vibration free. I can use the AllTrails app and don’t have to stop to see my location and where my next turn is. I can also answer the phone with speaker and am able to converse with the caller without having to stop and take my phone out of my pocket every time I receive a call ! Note I gave it only 4 stars for “easy to remove“ because it DOES fit so snug- which is a GOOD thing! If you are stopped it is easy to remove . Very pleased with this mount!
customer_reviews.author: PAK

customer_reviews.title: Great phone mount for my bike!
customer_reviews.text: This phone mount is so easy to use. The basic clamp holds my iPhoneXs very well, the rubber straps are really needed but they do add extra peace of mind that your phone can't bounce out. Nice to have the phone so accessible and not hidden behind a cover that makes the touchscreen unusable.
customer_reviews.author: JayT

customer_reviews.title: smaller than advertised
customer_reviews.text: While this is exactly what they advertised it as, a mount with a rubber band to hold the phone securely, the size of the phone that they state that it can handle is much larger than it actually can. My phone is 6.2 inches long and 3 inches wide. The rubber band that goes from corner to corner is stretched to the point that it discolored and the mount that holds it around the middle barely opens wide enough, if I work hard, to squeeze my phone in. All in all, if you have a smaller phone this will work as an inexpensive mount just fine. Just don't trust the size specs.
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia

customer_reviews.title: Fits my Samsung S9+ perfectly
customer_reviews.text: Fits my Samsung S9+ perfectly. I dislike that I have to take it out of it's battery cellphone case in order for it to fit, but it's really not a big deal. Other than that, it's easy to set up, very secure and haven't had any issues with the joint yet. So far, I'm very happy with my purchase. Pokemon Go, here I come. Oh, and if you're lucky like me and receive their 50th box you'll receive a voucher to get a second bike mount for free. This review is not required to get the second one free, by the way. Great product overall.
customer_reviews.author: Alejandro Rivera

customer_reviews.title: Great for the long rides
customer_reviews.text: This is very well made and has the additional item of straps to assure that your GPS or Cell Phone are held securely. I have an Iphone 8 that is the large version and the mount holds firmly. I can understand that this may not be made for a Mountain Bike, but for a road bike this is perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Ralph Racquet
